content:
With the SNOMED CT International edition url specified as the code system version I'm getting these errors (in the IPS Immunization/75680 example):

ERROR: Immunization/75680: Immunization.vaccineCode: Expansion Profile Error: the version "http://snomed.info/sct/900000000000207008" is inconsistent with the version "http://snomed.info/sct/900000000000207008" required by the profile
ERROR: Immunization/75680: Immunization.site: Expansion Profile Error: the version "http://snomed.info/sct/900000000000207008" is inconsistent with the version "http://snomed.info/sct/900000000000207008" required by the profile

The inconsistency appears to be in the error messages, as the urls are identical and the profile itself doesn't specify any code system versions. Also, I'm not sure what "Expansion Profile" is being referred to here, as the ExpansionProfile resource no longer exists.
there's still an expansion profile; it's just a parameters resource now, as the committee discussed
what version of the IG publisher is this with?

1.0.45-SNAPSHOT
I've removed the version elements now from the example (J#25532), as I don't think we need them - so the error isn't affecting me at the moment, but more broadly we would still want to fix it
I didn't recall that we were still calling the parameters the "Expansion Profile", but that's fine
